item.title: Support
item.description:
Supporting a charity can take many forms. Here are some donation options. Donations may be made online now using paypal website or through the US mail.

Donate via PayPal

If you wish to mail a check, here is the secure mailing address:

Periyaar International USA (EIN: 80-0282239)
5652 Chapel Hill Rd
Gurnee, Illinois -60031

When sending a check, please provide the name and address for notification.

item.description: Thanthai Periyar тАУ the father of Modern Dravidian movement тАУ a true visionary who propounded rationalism, a fierce leader who defied all odds, a leader without borders and boundaries dedicated his entire life to the fight against inequality and social injustice in striving to establish an egalitarian society. To eradicate Casteism in Indian society following the dictates of the Hindu religion where people are enslaved based on discrimination at birth. Indian Caste system earmarked at birth was dictated and cleverly manipulated by the Hindu religious doctrine which sets a top-down social structure of oppression that differentiates individuals based on birth...

item.title: Run For Periyar
item.description:
Run for Periyar

ЁЯОЙ Celebrate PeriyarтАЩs 145th Year with the Virtual Marathon:

Run for Periyar. ЁЯПГтАНтЩАя╕ПЁЯПГтАНтЩВя╕П

Run Anywhere! ЁЯПГтАНтЩАя╕ПЁЯПГтАНтЩВя╕П

ЁЯУЕ Date: Sep 1st to Sep 17th тП░ Time: Complete the run at your convenience. ЁЯУН Location: Anywhere you choose!

Join us in commemorating the 145th birth anniversary of Thanthai Periyar by participating in our special virtual marathon. HereтАЩs how you can be a part of this meaningful event:

  1. Select a date and time that works for you.
  2. Use your preferred fitness app to track and record your run.
  3. Take a screenshot of your completed run.
  4. Email the screenshot to...

item.title: Kahoot
item.description:
Syllabus: Chapter IV & V pages 61-113 (Add PDF from Price) Age: 13 - 21 yrs old Participation: Anyone can participate even if participating in other events. (Live event signup limit doesnтАЩt apply to Kahoot!) Access the Game: Open a web browser on your computer or mobile device. Go to the Kahoot! website (kahoot.com) or use the Kahoot! app if you have it installed.

Rules / Guidelines

item.title: роиро┐роХро┤рпНро╡рпБроХро│рпН
item.description:
Periyar, a great social revolutionary born more than a century and a half later than Rousseau, was a dauntless warriorтАжa free thinker who engaged his sharp intellect, questioned age old senseless beliefs and customs and tried to break free from the shackles of meaningless traditions and expose the master minded manipulation behind those beliefs.

Prizes

  • All the participants will get award of $25 USD
  • Participant will receive a certificate
  • Special talents prizes will be announced at the end of the program. Winner must be present of avail of this grand opportunity!

Rules

  • Participant must reside...

item.title: рокро╛роЯро▓рпН
item.description:
ThereтАЩs something magical about music. Singing a song is powerful as well. Music has the power to connect people, evoke thinking, reflect and emulate. When harnessed for a cause, music unites and inspires.

Are you a natural born singer or someone learning music? Periyar 145 celebratory event encourages you to showcase your musical talent by singing songs relating to the theme of social justice, equality, humanism. Vocalize your empathy, caring and compassion musically. We canтАЩt wait to hear you sing!

Why wait? Just do itтАж. Sign up NOW!!!Click here to register!

item.title: рооро╛ро▒рпБро╡рпЗроЯроорпН
item.description:
Dressing up and acting out stories with power & convictionтАж Drama is a very compelling way for child actors to walk around in the тАЬworld of the leaders who have made a difference to mankindтАЭтАж to experience what they experienced; to feel, in a very real way, the emotions that such scenarios raise; and to internalize the activistsтАЩ interpretation of these experiences is indeed a moment of joy, realization and experience not just for them but also the witnessing audience members.

Why wait? Just do itтАж. Sign up NOW!!!Click here to register!

Rules / Guidelines

item.title: роХро╡ро┐родрпИ
item.description:
Poetry is a creative expression which helps us relate/understand and appreciate people and things around us. Unleash the poet/artist in you тАУ be it a poem or drawing тАУ be a avant-garde composer (age appropriate) as you explore the themes of social justice, gender equality, humanism, rationalism and human rights.

Why wait? Just do itтАж. Sign up NOW!!!Click here to register!

Rules / Guidelines

  • Participant must reside in North America (USA,Canada, and Mexico)
  • Participant must 18 years or under
  • Participant must register to participate in any competition
  • Registration is FREE
  • Registration due by Saturday, 11.Sep.2021...

item.title: роХроЯрпНроЯрпБро░рпИ
item.description: Let your creative juices flow from your pen to paper. Periyar 145 celebratory event encourages you to bring out the writer in you. ItтАЩs your chance to affect others thru your words тАУ create an impact coz. written words are stronger and possess great emphasis compared to spoken wordsтАж coz writing gives more subtle yet solid messages. Your theme-based writing on topics presented on Periyar & social justice (the societal challenges and injustices we still see today around us), equality and humanism would help foster not only an awareness but potentially make a difference esp. among your peers and the...

item.title: Maruvedam
item.description:
Dressing up and acting out stories with power & convictionтАж Drama is a very compelling way for child actors to walk around in the тАЬworld of the leaders who have made a difference to mankindтАЭтАж to experience what they experienced; to feel, in a very real way, the emotions that such scenarios raise; and to internalize the activistsтАЩ interpretation of these experiences is indeed a moment of joy, realization and experience not just for them but also the witnessing audience members.

item.title: Kavithai
item.description:
Poetry is a creative expression which helps us relate/understand and appreciate people and things around us. Unleash the poet/artist in you тАУ be it a poem or drawing тАУ be a avant-garde composer (age appropriate) as you explore the themes of social justice, gender equality, humanism, rationalism and human rights.

Why wait? Just do itтАж. Sign up NOW!!!Click here to register!

Rules / Guidelines

  • Participant must reside in North America (USA,Canada, and Mexico)
  • Participant must 18 years or under
  • Participant must register to participate in any competition
  • Registration is FREE
  • Registration due by Saturday, 11.Sep.2021...

item.title: Katturai
item.description: Let your creative juices flow from your pen to paper. Periyar 145 celebratory event encourages you to bring out the writer in you. ItтАЩs your chance to affect others thru your words тАУ create an impact coz. written words are stronger and possess great emphasis compared to spoken wordsтАж coz writing gives more subtle yet solid messages. Your theme-based writing on topics presented on Periyar & social justice (the societal challenges and injustices we still see today around us), equality and humanism would help foster not only an awareness but potentially make a difference esp. among your peers and the...

item.title: Speech
item.description: тАЬSpeech is power: speech is to persuade, to convert, to compel.тАЭ тАФ Ralph Waldo Emerson, an American essayist and lecturer As we are getting ready to celebrate the life and legacy of Periyar Ayya, on his 143rd birthday, we think it would be very fitting for our youth to engage in a heartfelt rhetorical session learning about what turned a common man EVR into тАЬPeriyarтАЭ indeed. Our intent is to encourage inquisitive young minds to reason, rationalize and fearlessly ask questions especially when something does not connect with the intellectтАж just the way Periyar did. In an effort to follow...

item.title: Drawing
item.description:
A picture is worth a thousand words. Periyar 145 celebratory event encourages you to showcase your artistic talent to draw/paint a picture relating to Social Justice, Equality & Humanism. We canтАЩt wait to see the works of our little Picassos.

Your essay & drawing will be published in Periyar Pinju magazine in Tamilnadu, India with a wider reach of thousands of readers.
